name: process_constructions_garage_roof

arguments.name: selectedgarage
arguments.display_name: Of what space type is the garage

arguments.name: selectedroofmat
arguments.display_name: Roofing material for unfinished atticFor manually entering roofing material properties of unfinished attic, leave blank

arguments.name: userdefinedroofmatthermalabs
arguments.display_name: Roofing material emissivity of unfinished attic

arguments.name: userdefinedroofmatabs
arguments.display_name: Roofing material absorptance of unfinished attic

modeler_description: Calculates material layer properties of uninsulated, unfinished, stud and air constructions for the garage roof. Finds surfaces adjacent to the garage and sets applicable constructions.
description: This measure creates uninsulated, unfinished, stud and air constructions for the garage roof.
